project.name: Task Management App
project.description: Here's a straightforward description you can use for Spring Initializr: --- **Project Title**: Task Management App **Description**: This Java-based Task Management App is a RESTful application designed to manage users and their tasks. It allows for creating, reading, and managing tasks associated with individual users, using Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA, and an H2 in-memory database. The app includes basic CRUD operations to add, retrieve, and organize tasks by user, making it a practical tool for task tracking and user-specific task organization. **Key Features**: - RESTful API with endpoints for managing users and tasks - In-memory H2 database for data persistence during development - Basic user management and task association with a clean architecture - Modular structure with service and repository layers for clean code organization This project serves as a great introduction to Spring Boot development with a simple but functional task management system.
